short_summary: Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for bagged laundry services.
description: A Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) is required for the provision of all labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary to provide bagged laundry services. The Department of National Defence ( DND) will require the services during Canadian Maneuver Training Center (CMTC), and other DND Exercises, as required for the period of the Standing Offer.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Notice Title
W168A-23MK04: Bagged Laundry Services Request for Standing Offer

### Contracting Entity Information

*Contracting Entity: [egov-lrb-publicworks](mail to:tcispac-tpsgc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca]*)Provides notice of a Request for Standing Offer for Bagged Laundry Services.*
[ end of extraneous code ]

### Tender Details

Publishing Date:, 2023-06-07]
Tender Closing Date: 2023-07-04 14:00:00 (EDT)
Closing dates Tag}


The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of bagged laundry services. The scope of work includes all necessary labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision to deliver the services.
Bagged laundry services will be required at the Canadian Maneuver Training Center and other DND exercises as needed.

### Eligibility and Evaluation
All bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price. The successful bidder(s) will be selected through a competitive bid process.

### Commercial Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

### Contracting Information
